## Buckets interface

Provides methods to manage cloud buckets and stored bojects

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Buckets 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [blockPublicAccess(bucketName, blockAccess)](./api-buckets.buckets.blockpublicaccess.md) | (Un) Block ACLs/Policies that provide public bucket access |
|  [bucketExists(bucketName)](./api-buckets.buckets.bucketexists.md) | Check if a bucket of a given name exists |
|  [clean(bucketName, folder)](./api-buckets.buckets.clean.md) | Delete all files in a bucket or a folder in the bucket |
|  [createBucket(bucketName, options)](./api-buckets.buckets.createbucket.md) | Create a new bucket. |
|  [deleteBucket(bucketName, options)](./api-buckets.buckets.deletebucket.md) | Delete a bucket |
|  [deleteFile(bucketName, filePath, versionId)](./api-buckets.buckets.deletefile.md) | Delete a file |
|  [deletePolicy(bucketName)](./api-buckets.buckets.deletepolicy.md) | Delete resource permission policy associated with a bucket |
|  [getEncryption(bucketName)](./api-buckets.buckets.getencryption.md) | Get encryption configuration for a bucket |
|  [getFileAsBuffer(bucketName, filePath, options)](./api-buckets.buckets.getfileasbuffer.md) | Download file contents |
|  [getFileAsStream(bucketName, filePath, options)](./api-buckets.buckets.getfileasstream.md) | Download file contents |
|  [getFileMetadata(bucketName, filePath)](./api-buckets.buckets.getfilemetadata.md) | Get file metadata |
|  [getPolicy(bucketName)](./api-buckets.buckets.getpolicy.md) | Retrieve resource permission policy associated with a bucket |
|  [getVersioning(bucketName)](./api-buckets.buckets.getversioning.md) | Check if versioning of files is enabled for a bucket |
|  [getWebsiteConfiguration(bucketName)](./api-buckets.buckets.getwebsiteconfiguration.md) | Get Website configuration associated with a bucket |
|  [getWebsiteDomain(bucketName)](./api-buckets.buckets.getwebsitedomain.md) | Get the Website URL corresponding to a bucket |
|  [listBuckets(options)](./api-buckets.buckets.listbuckets.md) | List buckets visible to the current user or role |
|  [listFiles(bucketName, options)](./api-buckets.buckets.listfiles.md) | List files in a bucket or folder within a bucket |
|  [listFileVersions(bucketName, options)](./api-buckets.buckets.listfileversions.md) | Retrieve a paginated list of versions for a file |
|  [putFile(bucketName, filePath, file, options)](./api-buckets.buckets.putfile.md) | Upload a file to a bucket |
|  [setEncryption(bucketName, flag, options)](./api-buckets.buckets.setencryption.md) | Turn default server side encryption of bucket files on or off |
|  [setPolicy(bucketName, policy)](./api-buckets.buckets.setpolicy.md) | Set bucket permission policy |
|  [setVersioning(bucketName, flag)](./api-buckets.buckets.setversioning.md) | Turn on/off versioning of files in a bucket |
|  [setWebsiteConfiguration(bucketName, options)](./api-buckets.buckets.setwebsiteconfiguration.md) | Set Website configuration associated with a bucket |
